doc: > I recently got my router setup to port forward 11753 so I can host multiplayer games. Everything works smoothly at first, people join, build stuff, no issues. Then after a while the whole game just crashes to the desktop, no idea why. Every time I reload the server this will happen eventually. I have no idea if it's the game or something network related. Any help would be great.
> Current build: 0.0.4.0 build 547837f OS: Windows 10 Router: Netgear WNDR4300
The save game is enough to trigger the FP exception.
